___enableExpress.description: Value that indicates whether Express Entities are enabled. An express topic holds a message in memory temporarily before writing it to persistent storage.

___filteringMessagesBeforePublishing.description: Whether messages should be filtered before publishing.

___enableBatchedOperations.description: Value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled..

___status.description: Enumerates the possible values for the status of a messaging entity.

___requiresDuplicateDetection.description: Value indicating if this topic requires duplicate detection.

___enableSubscriptionPartitioning.description: Value that indicates whether partitioning is enabled or disabled..

___isAnonymousAccessible.description: Value that indicates whether the message is anonymous accessible.

___autoDeleteOnIdle.description: TimeSpan idle interval after which the topic is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.

___createdAt.description: Exact time the message was created.

___accessedAt.description: Last time the message was sent or a request was received for this topic.

___maxSizeInMegabytes.description: Maximum size of the topic in megabytes, which is the size of memory allocated for the topic.

___enablePartitioning.description: Value that indicates whether the topic to be partitioned across multiple message brokers is enabled.

___updatedAt.description: The exact time the message has been updated.

___defaultMessageTimeToLive.description: Default message time to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to Service Bus. This is the default value used when TimeToLive is not set on a message itself.

___supportOrdering.description: Value that indicates whether the topic supports ordering.

___entityAvailabilityStatus.description: Entity availability status for the topic.

___sizeInBytes.description: Size of the topic in bytes.

___duplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow.description: TimeSpan structure that defines the duration of the duplicate detection history. The default value is 10 minutes..

___deadLetteringOnMessageExpiration.description: a value that indicates whether this queue has dead letter support when a message expires.

___messageCount.description: the number of messages in the queue.

___lockDuration.description: the duration of a peek lock; that is, the amount of time that the message is locked for other receivers. The maximum value for LockDuration is 5 minutes; the default value is 1 minute.

___enableBatchedOperations.description: value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled..
